backend/main.mo: Defines data types for books, users, meditation sessions, journaling, rituals, and stores static book data inside an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented feature changes with associated file paths, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites and steps for redeploying the app without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing and documenting deployment failures across each build and deploy stage.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and light/dark theme variables using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up favicon, error handlers, and loading the React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider, error boundary, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Audio carousel that lets users preview looping ambient sounds with swipe navigation, mute, and volume control.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed error UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays a retryable error alert for cloud sync failures with messaging based on error type.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Numeric input component for selecting a start/end minute range and emitting a clamped duration.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with hover labels and animated buttons for major app routes.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, authentication actions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Popover-based filter panel for journal entries including moods, energy, dates, favorites, and text search.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paged book-like reader with swipe, keyboard navigation, and scroll-to-content behavior.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between items, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow according to a provided growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Animated particle system around the lotus that switches between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas animation rendering lotus particles and pulses with theme- and variant-based visual effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Meditation type carousel with swipe navigation and centered card scaling logic.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper component for meditation steps with swipe navigation, animations, and content parsing for benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based animated circular timer ring with wave effects and theme-aware colors driven by progress.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component showing a circular liquid fill animation with easing and wave motion based on progress.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: A mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper providing a full-screen background with a LotusCanvas layer and customizable variant and intensity.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl that fills with animated liquid reflecting total meditation minutes with theme-based colors.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus progress visualization using react-three-fiber with growth state, lighting, particles, and auto-rotation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates petal openness, glow, and breathing effects based on total minutes, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Interactive quiz dialog that collects five answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and lets users start or delete them, falling back to an empty state message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting rituals with swipe, navigation, and confirmation dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows guest or logged-in status and provides navigation to start or logout while clearing related queries.
Navigation bar providing theme toggle, back navigation, session indicator, and mobile menu components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook wrapping cloud write operations with automatic retry logic using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and wrapping AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Custom hook implementing a countdown meditation timer with pause, seeking, progress calculation, and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query with local and cloud data logic for meditation types, quotes, journal entries, progress, and rituals, using guest fallbacks when backend is unavailable.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines structured meditation technique content including pages and quiz questions for learning modules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, react-query, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
Empty or placeholder page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays swipeable book recommendation cards with circular navigation and theme controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing quotes, meditation options, rituals management, and navigation to sessions or quiz.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal management page supporting filtering, editing, favoriting, deleting, and importing/exporting entries.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge library with technique categories, scrollable content, and quizzes with stored scores.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Large component for configuring a meditation session, selecting guides, moods, energy, duration, and handling timer, saving rituals, and recording sessions.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user meditation progress, visual stats, import/export functionality, and cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a stats page.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Defines cloud sync error types and maps backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations, distinguishing between authorization and readiness errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Implements JSON export/import format plus serialization and deserialization of meditation data with bigint safety and validation.
Manages localStorage persistence of quiz scores, including per-user keys and a React hook for accessing and saving scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visuals over 0â€“20,000 minutes, determining phases and generating parameters like openness, maturity, vividness, and particle behavior.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only meditation data in localStorage, including journals, progress, rituals, and legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines progress rank tiers based on total minutes and provides helpers to get current/next rank and minutes remaining.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing meditation page UI regressions and timer alignment.
